Item ID3753

A warrior helm is a piece of armour that can be worn by players who have completed The Fremennik Trials quest and have a Defence level of 45. The helm can be bought at the Skulgrimen's Battle Gear shop in Rellekka for 78,000 coins. It's also a possible reward from Barbarian Assault High Gambles.

Due to its lack of a strength bonus, the warrior helm is far less popular than its counterpart, the berserker helm, despite having a small slash bonus (+5) and better defence against the slash attacks (+33 instead of +29). However, it is a good alternative to the fighter hat, assuming those who plan to use the warrior helm are using a slash weapon, especially considering that it provides slightly better resistance to all attacks.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Warrior helm detail.png|left|165px]]
[[File:Warrior helm chathead.png|left]]
A '''warrior helm''' is a piece of [[armour]] that can be worn by players who have completed [[The Fremennik Trials]] quest and have a [[Defence]] level of 45. The helm can be bought at the [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]] shop in [[Rellekka]] for 78,000 [[coins]]. It's also a possible reward from [[Barbarian Assault]] [[Barbarian Assault/Rewards#High%20gambles|High Gambles]].

Due to its lack of a strength bonus, the warrior helm is far less popular than its counterpart, the [[berserker helm]], despite having a small [[slash]] bonus (+5) and better defence against the slash attacks (+33 instead of +29). However, it is a good alternative to the [[fighter hat]], assuming those who plan to use the warrior helm are using a slash weapon, especially considering that it provides slightly better resistance to all attacks.
